name: Hillingdon Prince Hotel

reviews.text: Spent a pleasant 4 nights in this hotel. Large rooms, and very clean. The fridge and microwave is ideal to have light meals in the room. Location is really very good, with just about 5-10 mins from the University of Reading, and the buses 20, 21 just 2 min walk away. I would surely return!
reviews.title: Nice hotel, great location!

reviews.text: i have stayed here very regularly over the last 2 years and recent upgrades to the rooms make it a pleasant place to stay. Friendly staff and good perks in the room such as widescreen tv, fridge and microwaves.
reviews.title: decent accomodation in reading

reviews.text: Stayed a night on the weekend for a friends birthday. Was very quiet no rowdy crowds to wake up up in the moddle of the night. Very clean room and was impressed with amenities in the room. The bathroom needed a slight update but was still clean and tidy
reviews.title: Amazing stay. Friendly staff

reviews.text: I have stayed twice at the Hillingdon in the last year for business reasons. As I was at the time self employed I needed to get a good deal....and I did. The overnight stay in June was during a heat wave and the rooms do lack air conditioning, but this was soon remedied by opening both sets of windows.
reviews.title: Good Value for Money

reviews.text: The front desk helped me with some urgent faxes and this was very much appreciated.
reviews.title: Best breakfast ive ever had in a hotel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very good value for money, stayed here when visiting our son. Rooms were small but clean. there was tea and coffee provided in the room and our room also had a fridge. Full English breakfast included in price, which was freshly cooked to order. Would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Hillingd prince hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed 4 nights at the Hillingdon Prince and will come back next time. It had the qualities that I look for:
reviews.title: Own "kitchen"
Good value good location
reviews.text: Large room (at least the one I got).

I particularly appreciated the possibility to eat in the room: fridge, microwave, boiling water, plate, knife, fork, plates, tea/coffee. They will even wash the dishes for you. Plenty of take away and shops just nearby.
reviews.title: Dirty, mouldy dump

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The basin had a separate hot and cold tap... not practical but typically English!
reviews.title: RCCC - Reasonable, Comfortable, Clean and Caring

reviews.text: Fantastic staff that really go out of their way to help you. Rooms are spacious and really clean. Breakfast was very tasty and service was pleasant. I have already booked for the next 4 weeks and I won't be staying anywhere else in reading!
reviews.title: Great service!

reviews.text: Lovely bright clean rooms, ours had flat screen TV and fridge and microwave was excellent as saved us spending too much on eating out. The bed was really comfortable and we had a great nights sleep. Bathroom was really clean. I travel to reading regularly so will be staying again. Thanks for a great stay!
reviews.title: Welcoming hotel

reviews.text: I stayed 3 nights at Hillingdon prince. The room we had was large and clean and had fridge and microwave which was a great bonus! All the staff are fantastic and were really helpful with directions and recommending places to visit. There is free wifi which was great but also free use of computer if you don't have a laptop. Breakfast was freshly cooked to order and great selection of continental buffet as well, we were spoilt for choice! Next time I visit reading I will definitely be staying at Hillingdon prince.
reviews.title: Clean and comfortable

reviews.text: I stayed in the hotel for a week, in another building outside and was very happy to find that the room was very clean, the bed was very comfortable. There was even a mini kitchen, microwave and fridge,which was very good to save costs and just eating in.
reviews.title: Clean and comfortable

reviews.text: The location served my purposes as being only a 15 min walk to the town centre,were i work. There is also lots of parking so i could leave my car and save me the hassel of finding parking in town. The staff was also very friendly and helpful!!!
reviews.title: Dated and basic and very insecure

reviews.text: Booked my husband in initially for two nights but plans changed and it turned out to be for just one night. On arrival there was a slight misunderstanding with the booking but this was quickly sorted and at no point did they try to blame anyone. Ensuring that even though all single rooms were allocated a solution would be found. The person on reception was very polite and kind and sorted the problem out very quickly, with no fuss and resulting in my husband being given a large two bedroom apartment for the night. This was clean, comfortable and as next to the hotel very quiet, he had a very good nights sleep.
reviews.title: Staff so helpful and pleasant

reviews.text: Breakfast was very good as we have found on previous stays. Being replenished all the time and table cleared of all debris as soon as finished.
reviews.title: Great basic value

reviews.text: Ok the shower had a few problems with temperature control but for the price of the stay was not an issue.
reviews.title: A lovely stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have used the Hillingdon Prince before and would not hesitate to use again.
reviews.title: Pretty darn good

reviews.text: The rooms were basic but pleasant, and had everything I needed for my stay. It was good to have a lounge and the thing that made my stay more pleasant were the genuinely kind and helpful staff who always greeted us with a smile. They were very helpful as we didn't know the area.
reviews.title: Great value, clean, helpful smily staff.

description: Stay with us for clean comfortable rooms at affordable prices. Our rooms offer microwaves and fridges and some with mini kitchens. Ideal for the cost conscious traveller as you are the able to cater for yourself. We can also arrange free delivery and discounts at our local restaurants. We offer FREE secure wifi, gym and 24 hour reception. We serve breakfast daily. Located just a short walk to the Royal Berkshire Hospital, Reading University, the Town Centre and a short drive to all the local Business Parks.
